channel.title: [562$] Corruption_X source+client 100+ downloaded![562]
channel.description:
[size=19pt]Corruption-X [562] [/size]
Source Download - [url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html]http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html[/url] Client Download - [url=http://atomicupload.net/download/156/Project_562_Client.rar.html]http://atomicupload.net/download/156/Project_562_Client.rar.html[/url] NOTE: This isn't the official client, this is just my personal client. If it doesn't work just look up 562 client on google and download that.
4.999999% To TyrawrV1.2 for releasing the source. 0.000001% for me putting it here. (Again but better) :o 23% To John for giving someone the source than that person released it also for helping code it. (I think) 22% Caleum 22% DragonKK 22% BO
P.S Probably 25% of these features don't work. only on the current CorruptionX server. (Not 100% Sure Though)
Known Glitches:
Problem: When your using a client it is 100% sure when you log out from your client and log back in, it will show a black screen. Solution: You must restart the client to fix this. Problem: On certain sources when you log in you might be randomly walking aka no-clipping. Solution: Get a new client.
Features:
- GWD - SW - CW - Bork - Jad - Corporeal Beast - KQ - Summoning - Fishing - Smithing - Firemaking - Mining - Woodcutting - Thieving - G/e (IDK 100% I didn't test the source) - Smithing Shop - Armour Shop - Skillcape Shop (I Think)
[size=13pt]That's all! Enjoy the source. :)[/size] ____________________________
[size=16pt]Special Attacks

Multi Barrage
[img]http://i49.tinypic.com/r2lvcx.png[/img][/size]
*I Would recommend using this source as your first 562, it's mostly coded it has Soul Wars, Clan Wars fully working. Almost all skills fully working. Special Attacks. PVP Bosses G/e And More!
Soure Download - [url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html]http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html[/url] Source Download #2 - [url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html]http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html[/url] Source Download #3 - [url=http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html]http://www.atomicupload.net/download/192/Corruption_X.rar.html[/url]
